title: Seo Eun-ah
text: Seo Eun-ah (born February 26, 1989) is a South Korean actress. She graduated from the <a href="Korea%20National%20University%20of%20Arts">Korea National University of Arts</a> School of Drama with a <a href="Major%20%28academic%29">major</a> in Acting and a <a href="Minor%20%28academic%29">minor</a> in Dance, and began her entertainment career in 2005 by appearing in <a href="Dove%20%28toiletries%29">Dove</a> commercials. In 2013, Seo beat 200 hopefuls when she auditioned three times for the leading role as a student who has an affair with her professor's husband in the film "Act", for which she won the <a href="Grand%20Bell%20Awards">Grand Bell Award</a> for Best New Actress.
